Title: Senior Technology Assurance - Ha Noi Office
Location: 16 Phố Phan Chu Trinh, Phan Chu Trinh, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Bitexco Financial Tower, 28th Floor, 2 Hai Trieu street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City & 8th Floor, Corner Stone Building, 16 Phan Chu Trinh, Hoan Kiem, Hanoi
Job Description:
At EY, we’re all in to shape your future with confidence.

We’ll help you succeed in a globally connected powerhouse of diverse teams and take your career wherever you want it to go.

Join EY and help to build a better working world.

The opportunity: Senior – Technology Assurance

EY’s Technology Assurance services are designed for the dual purpose of strengthening internal controls and, in so doing, helping to improve IT and business performance. In addition to assurance-related engagements such as financial audit IT (FAIT), our services focus on IT governance and effectiveness; IT internal control assessment; security and controls of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) implementations; and risk data analysis.

We are currently seeking senior associate positions in the following areas:

- IT Process Risk & Internal Controls assessment
- Application System Risk & Controls assessment
- Data Delivery and Analysis Services practice
- Financial Services Technology Risk and IT Regulatory Services
Your key responsibilities

- Perform IT audits for systems that generate financial statements that includes the effectiveness evaluation of IT General controls across IT environments, automated functions in ERP system system, data reports.
- Support Executives in directing daily progress of fieldwork, informing works status, and managing performance in delivering IT audit assignments against established methodologies, frameworks and global best practices
- Apply a thorough understanding of system functions, IT controls to support Managers in controls optimization assignments, in identify client or audit challenges, and in providing/ implementing/ assessing solutions.
- Apply digital solutions and technology such as Alteryx, SQL, RPA and Python etc. to analyze data and identify abnormal criteria's in digital assurance engagements.

Title: Kỹ Sư Cơ Điện
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Bán Lẻ Kỹ Thuật Số FPT
Location: Khu công nghiệp Quang Minh, tt. Quang Minh, Mê Linh, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Tầng 6 - Zodiac, 19 Duy Tân, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội
Job Description:
- Tham gia công tác đấu thầu, thẩm định năng lực nhà thầu, thẩm định chất lượng hồ sơ dự thầu, thẩm định kết quả thực hiện công việc của các nhà thầu
- Giám sát hiện trường theo hồ sơ thiết kế được duyệt.
- Kiểm tra biện pháp thi công, bản vẽ shop drawing, và tiêu chuẩn vật tư thiết bị.
- Theo dõi, ghi nhận tiến độ và chất lượng công việc của các nhà thầu xây dựng.
- Phối hợp với nhà thầu thi công và các bộ phận kỹ thuật khác để đảm bảo thi công đồng bộ, không xung đột hệ thống và xử lý các vấn đề kỹ thuật phát sinh.
- Theo dõi nghiệm thu công việc, nghiệm thu giai đoạn và hoàn công cho các hạng mục & công việc được phân công.
- Tham gia hoàn thiện hồ sơ chất lượng công trình.

Title: (Senior) Retail Marketing Executive (Brand: MAC & Bobbi Brown)
Location: Royal Tower, 235 Đường Nguyễn Văn Cừ, Nguyễn Cư Trinh, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Royal Tower, 235 Đường Nguyễn Văn Cừ, Nguyễn Cư Trinh, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
1. Position Summary:
This position is accountable for Retail/ Commercial Planning across channels, aligning with in-market Commercial team, and other stakeholders in execution of campaign promotion, VM, and activation to achieve the brand objectives. This role works closely with in-market Consumer Engagement as well as in-market Education for planning and execution of all brand activities etc.

• Execute in-market Retail activation plan (including VM) to deliver omni-retail promotions by channel / retailer
• Support local promotions, events, and concepts to deliver in-Market Brand KPIs
• Support Key Account management across channels on promotional calendar and retail / VM execution to drive elevated in-store experiences and omnichannel execution excellence
• Support Affiliate MVIP Brand to execute in-market building block for all channels: promo, in store events, etc
• Support VM planning for in-market events
• Share in-market insights with MVIP Brand team on NPL quantity and pricing
2. Key Responsibilities:

Retail Marketing Plan – Execute and deliver:
• Execute new product launching, re-promote, and Mega campaign
• Collaborate with In-Market CE, Commercial teams and DCM to execute omni channel commercial and activation for launch/mega campaign
• Support all local Mega Campaign Offers in alignment with In-Market Brand teams
• Unity Campaign implementation & Always-on promotion across channels (OL, B&M, SMC)
• Support and deliver monthly always-on or tactical promotion plan
• Provide support and execute all commercial proposal in current channels or new programs to over-deliver target
• Monitor promotion allocation under guidelines
• Timely checking of promotion running to ensure full compliance with anti-diversion protocols
• Visual Merchandising Implementation:
• Provide any feedback to MVIP Product Marketing on forecast of New launch/ Visual Merchandising Update/ Tester Bar/ Displayer, Collaterals in B&M/SMC in accordance with Brand guidelines and allocated budget where applicable
• Cascade provided guidelines, briefing to agency, and execute the deployment in stores for New Launch Counter decoration or VM updates
• Response and work alongside with Retail Project and VM on counter requests for counter maintenance
• New Counter/Renovation Store Design and set-up:
• Partner with Retail Project and VM and in-market Commercial in new counter set up

Retail Partner Collaboration:
• Support in-market Country and Commercial Manager to maintain Retailer Relationship and counter activation communication
• Support in-market Country and Commercial Manager to represent In-Market Brands to coordinate with Retailers in communicating Brand Campaign/Monthly Activities in respective stores
• Engage and align with Retailers to support the commercial and activation execution in store with collaborative initiatives (Data, Voucher, CRM, Retailer Visibility Support)
• Support MVIP marketing strategies in Corporate Sales and Collaboration proposal
• Assist in managing external partners in collaboration programs (Commercial Deals, Data sharing, Workshop, Visibility Support)
• Coordinate with internal team to execute the collaboration

Retail Marketing Operation:
• Charge out Non charge products for omni channel promotion plan across channels.
• Charge out VM collaterals, displayers to respective stores based on local planograms.
• Align with in-market Commercial and in-market Online Team on track and improve promotion-driven business performance and actual promo usage on monthly basis.
• Monitor and report Voucher spending by Store
• Monitor and report Control promo usage and promo cost under given budget
• Monitor VM, counter decoration and ensure within allocated monthly maintenance Budget
• Feedback on Competitor Activity Tracking
• Coordinate Customer Workshop

Others
To complete any tasks / project involvement / corporate activities as required by Country and Commercial Manager or MVIP Brand Pod Lead.

Title: Content Marketing Senior/junior Manager
Company: Công Ty TNHH ActsOne Việt Nam
Location: R. 803 - 11th Floor, Nguyen Lam Tower, 133 Duong Ba Trac, Chanh Hung Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, Số 20 Đường 01, Khu Đô Thị Mới Him Lam, Phường Tân Hưng, Quận 7, Thành Phố Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
Job Overview
At ActsOne Vietnam, the Content Marketing Senior/Junior Manager
plays a crucial role in elevating our Korean makeup brand's presence in the Vietnamese market. This position is ideal for beauty industry professionals who have developed deep expertise in cosmetics marketing through consistent, long-term engagement with makeup and skincare brands. You will be responsible for managing content strategy across multiple platforms while driving measurable performance results through targeted campaigns that resonate with Vietnamese beauty consumers.

1. Content Strategy & copywriting
Plan, produce, and manage content across SNS platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Zalo)
Create compelling visual and video content using AI tools (ChatGPT, CapCut, Canva, etc.)
Write persuasive copy that resonates with Vietnamese beauty consumers
Manage content calendars and ensure consistent brand messaging
Collaborate with internal teams and external creators to maintain content quality

2. SNS Advertising & Performance Marketing
Plan, execute, and optimize paid advertising campaigns on Meta (Facebook/Instagram), TikTok, and Google
Manage advertising budgets and maximize ROI through data-driven optimization
Conduct A/B testing on ad creatives, audiences, and messaging
Track KPIs (CTR, CPA, ROAS, conversion rates) and provide actionable insights
Analyze campaign performance and implement continuous improvements

3. Influencer & Affiliate Marketing
Identify and build relationships with Vietnamese beauty influencers and KOLs
Negotiate and manage influencer partnerships and campaigns
Track influencer campaign performance and ROI
Coordinate with affiliate partners to amplify brand reach

4. Analytics & Reporting
Monitor and analyze content performance metrics across all channels
Prepare weekly/monthly reports with actionable recommendations
Use data insights to refine content and advertising strategies
Stay updated on Vietnamese beauty market trends and competitor activities
